@gerkey and I found that the problem was that VISIBLE keyword need to act differently when you are compiling the own library (let's say gazebo_common) and when you are compiling all the rest of the other gazebo libraries that use the previous library (let's say gazebo_physics using gazebo_common), since the VISIBLE keyword is in the headers, which are used when compiling other libraries.

Following the example, when you are compiling gazebo_common, you want the GZ_COMMON_VISIBLE set to dllexport, but when you are compiling gazebo_physics, you want GZ_COMMON_VISIBLE set to dllimport while you need a different one GZ_PHYSICS_VISIBLE set to dllexport.

More or less clear?
